CAMPAIGN_NAME: Metal accumulation and metallothionein study in brown trout from Rugla and Naustebekken rivers
ORGANISATION: Norwegian University of Science and Technology
CAMPAIGN_COMMENT: Study compared brown trout from two Norwegian rivers differently contaminated with metals - Rugla (Cu-contaminated) and Naustebekken (Cd/Zn-contaminated) at Røros, Central Norway. Fish were captured June-July 1997 and early September 1998. Water samples collected at regular intervals during ice-free season May-October 1997.
